title: Newly Built Specious 3 storied house with 31 Perch Land for Sale
details:
31 perches Land with a newly built house located 1 KM from the main road.

The property located in an Eco-friendly calm and quite an environment with beautiful surrounding.

The house consists of 04- rooms, 02 bathrooms, 02 living & dining rooms, kitchen, well water and other necessary facilities are available.

IDEAL FOR GUEST HOUSE OR AYURVEDIC CLINIC.
